item.title: RPi with K3S with Knative
item.description: The process # Use Ubuntu Server 64 bit OS # The Rasberry Pi OS is 32 bit and wont work for Envoy which only has arm64 images available. Install OS # Download the Ubuntu OS, extract the zip file Install it to the SD Card Instructions diskutil list # Get disk# diskutil unmountDisk /dev/diskN sudo dd bs=1m if=path_of_your_image.img of=/dev/rdiskN; sync sudo diskutil eject /dev/rdiskN replacing N with the disk number

item.title: CKAD Notes
item.description: Sparse CKAD Notes # Node # Runs the containers deployed on K8s. It is the worker Kubelet # Agent running on the node that monitors health of pods and running pods on the container runtime Container Runtime # Engine that runs the containers Master # Handles all requests and is the brains that orchestrates work on the workers API Server # Receives all incoming API requests and is the frontend to K8s cluster
